definition: variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: Still hiding the mysterious force with unbeknown more of the truth rear?
sentences.chinese: 难道真相的背后还隐匿着更多不为人知的神秘力量？

sentences.english: The following are just a few of these secrets of the food industry.
sentences.chinese: 以下仅仅是食品工业中不为人知事实中的几个。

sentences.english: The airplane can also do many things noone knows about.
sentences.chinese: 这架飞机可以做很多不为人知的事情。

sentences.english: His past is ancient and unbeknown just like his true power.
sentences.chinese: 他的过去古老而不为人知，就如同他的真实力量一般。

sentences.english: They're a little-known commodity, I think, and little-understood.
sentences.chinese: 我想，它们是几乎不为人知也不为人理解的日用品。

sentences.english: Yet sooner or later—we trust—even these hidden stories will be told.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们相信，迟早这些不为人知的故事将会被诉说。

sentences.english: The True Guru is likely to remain unnoticed.
sentences.chinese: 真正的上师很可能继续不为人知。

sentences.english: Behind sher success, many of the secrets hidden.
sentences.chinese: 在她成功的背后，隐藏着许多不为人知的秘密。

sentences.english: Emma, the No. 2 most-popular girl's name, is a version of what less well-known name?
sentences.chinese: 女孩子第二常用的名字还有一个怎样不为人知的形式？

sentences.english: Many cameras look towards me, I don’t know how can wipe my tears without other’s being aware of.
sentences.chinese: 多少摄影机对着我，要如何不为人知地拭泪？

sentences.english: Jiang Gaoming and Tang Aimin investigate the shady underbelly of China's poultry industry.
sentences.chinese: 蒋高明与唐爱民调查了中国家禽业不为人知的故事。

sentences.english: I hope the film captures one of the great untold stories of America.
sentences.chinese: 我希望这部电影描述了美国不为人知的故事之一。

sentences.english: Garth has a skeleton in his closet.
sentences.chinese: 贾斯有个不为人知的秘密。

definition: rarely known to anyone (idiom); almost unknown/secret to all but a few
no use to tell others/let's keep this between ourselves (idiom)
pinyin: bu4 zu2 wei2 wai4 ren2 dao4

definition: to hide/to conceal/to mask/to shelter/to harbor (i.e. keep sth hidden)/to hide oneself/to lie low/to nestle/hidden/implicit/private/covert/recessed (lighting)
behind/at the back/in the rear/behind sb's back
behind-the-scenes story/details known only to insiders
one's life experience/one's lot/one's past history
